mapper.insert: insert into diary (user_no,diary_context,diary_isopen, diary_iscomment,diary_date) values (#{user_no},#{diary_context}, #{diary_isopen},#{diary_iscomment}, now())
mapper.select: select diary_no, diary_date, diary_context, diary_isopen, diary_iscomment, diary_image from diary where user_no = #{no} order by diary_date desc
select diary_no, diary_date, diary_context, diary_isopen, diary_iscomment, diary_image from diary where diary_no = #{diary_no}
select diary_no, diary_date, diary_context, diary_isopen, diary_iscomment, diary_image from diary where diary_isopen=1 order by diary_date desc
select diary_no, diary_date, diary_context, diary_isopen, diary_iscomment, diary_image from diary where diary_no in (select diary_no from bookmark where user_no = #{no}) order by diary_date desc;
